ComicInfo.Title: Wake Up and Smell the Coffin
ComicInfo.Writer: Eric A. Anderson,Manny Trembley,Eric Anderson,Eric Anderson,Manny Trembley
ComicInfo.Summary: Wake Up and Smell the Coffin: Sam has been knocked out and buried alive and really isn't too happy about that. Digging himself out of the situation, Sam makes quick work of the jungle girl. With his friend turned against him by the witch doctor, Sam has to battle through Grog to get to the villain. Sam and Grog head off to track down the man who put out the contract on Sam's life.
